name: Spiced Cranberry Rum Fizz
description: Incorporating the classic flavors of cranberry sauce--tart cranberries, the warm spice of orange zest, and a kick of ginger--this drink re-imagines the timeless flavors of the season.
recipeIngredient: peeled zest from 2 oranges, white pith removed
2 cups unsweetened 100% cranberry juice, such as Knudsen's
1 cup plus 2 tablespoons white rum, such as Flor de Cana Extra Seco
Sliced fresh cranberries for garnish, optional (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: For the Orange Ginger Simple Syrup: Combine the orange zest, grated ginger, sugar, and water in a small saucepan over high heat. Bring to a boil then reduce to a simmer. Cook for 7 minutes. Let cool to room temperature then strain through a fine mesh strainer and discard solids. Refrigerate in a sealed container until ready to use, up to 1 week.

For the Spiced Cranberry Mixer: In a pitcher or quart jar, stir together the orange ginger syrup, cranberry juice, and rum. Refrigerate until ready to use, up to 1 week after you've made the orange ginger syrup.
For each cocktail: Pour spiced cranberry mixer into a coupe glass and top with sparkling wine. Stir once and garnish with a few thinly sliced fresh cranberries.
